front.title: Standard for Conformance to IEEE P802.20 Systems - Protocol Implementation Conformance Statement(PICS)Proforma

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This standard represents the Protocol Implementation Conformance Statement Proforma, per ISO/IEC 9646-7 and ITU-T X.296, for conformance specification of access nodes and access terminals based on the air interface specified in IEEE Std 802.20
